title: Whereas we are highly sensible of the many and great inconveniences, which His Majesties good subjects in this kingdome are too frequently brought under by the multitude of causeless presentments and indictments, which are usually prosecuted at the assizes and sessions, rather out of malice or revenge than for the furtherance of justice ... by the Lord Lieutenant and Council, Jo. Berkeley.
author: Ireland. Lord Lieutenant (1670-1672 : Berkeley)
publisher: Printed by Benjamin Tooke ... and are to be sold by Mary Crooke ...,
